name: Loading... (Klghjl)
description:
This is my entry to the Pixel Game Jam!

You play a litte sphere of electricity, that can be charged with green spheres of electricity in order to shoot an lightning-sphere, that breaks walls.

There is a little tutorial that teaches you about the most important game mechanics.  With that knowledge you can play 6 more levels. Feel free to speedrun!

The game was created in under 48 hours and using only my art, code and knowledge.
